sentences.sContent: All the medical workers in the region helped to put down the influenza epidemic.
sentences.sContent_eng: All the medical workers in the region helped to put down the influenza epidemic.
sentences.sCn: 这个地区的所有医务工作者参加了消灭流行性感冒的工作。

sentences.sContent: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.sContent_eng: People should therefore continue to seek seasonal influenza vaccination like any other year.
sentences.sCn: 因此，人们应当像以往一样继续接种季节性流感疫苗。

synos.tran: [中医][内科]流行性感冒（简写flu）；家畜流行性感冒

phrases.pCn: 禽流感；家禽流行性感冒

remMethod.val: 流行性感冒(influenza)会影响(influence)很多人

trans.tranOther: an infectious disease that is like a very bad cold
